name: Flower's past
description:
A game is created before it is played.

And I present to you a level-editor.

In this tiny demo, you can build a mini-maze on a 10 x 10 grid.

This is my group's submission to the Extra Credits Holiday 2018 Game Jam

It's a 2D grid re-present-ed in isometric view, for the sake of the theme : the editor is referred to as the past and the rest of the game as the present.

Development team : Netriago, Julian and Trian
